name: Block Puzzle - Made with Godot
description: Block Puzzle is a simple, addictive, challenging and fun to play puzzle game which has Sudoku like (10x10) grid. It is similar to the Tetris game but here instead of blocks coming from top, you have to drag blocks from bottom and place it on the grid. This wood block puzzle game is full of so many innovative ideas and rules that will make your game play more interesting. If you are bored and want to relax or remove your stress, you can try this game. It will give you challenges and many options to gain high scores and become top in the leaderboard.
